dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.OffCycleCustomerBill
dataStructure.description:
The official date of the bill

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: OffCycleCustomerBill

child.name: billDate
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: billDate

child.name: chargeDate
child.description:
A date through which charges previously received by the billing system appear on the bill.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: chargeDate

child.name: paymentDueDate
child.description:
A customer bill payment due date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: paymentDueDate

child.name: creditDate
child.description:
A date through which credits previously received by the billing system appear on the bill.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditDate

child.name: mailingDate
child.description:
A customer bill mailing date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: mailingDate

child.name: offCycleProductionReason
child.description:
The reason for this cycle run reason, values may be CUSTOMER_REQUEST, ACCOUNT_CLOSE or others

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: offCycleProductionReason
